title: Old Football Fans Vandalism Video Revived As Muslims Rioting In Birmingham
subtitle: The original video from Switzerland, showing violent clashes following a football match, was shared a year ago and has been revived again with the same false claim
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
"Muslims attack motorists in Birmingham UK as they wanted to block the road and break their fast."

BOOM had fact checked the same claim earlier and found it to be false. The original video from Basel, Switzerland, shows violent clashes that broke out after a championship match between Basel and Lucerne football clubs near a stadium in Birsstrasse on May 19, 2018, according to news reports. Read more about the incident here and here.
